mapper.insert: insert into reviews( reservation_id, rating, review_text ) values( #{reservation_id}, #{rating}, #{review_text} )
mapper.select: select r.review_id, r.reservation_id, r.rating, r.review_text, r.created_at, r.updated_at, hs.main_title, hs.host_space_id, pro.name as product_name from reviews r inner join reservations res on r.reservation_id = res.reservation_id inner join products pro on res.product_id = pro.product_id inner join host_space hs on pro.host_space_id = hs.host_space_id where res.user_id = #{user_id} order by r.created_at desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select image_id, entity_type, entity_id, image_up_folder, image_name, created_at from images where entity_type = 'reviews' and entity_id = #{review_id}
select count(*) from reviews r inner join reservations res on r.reservation_id = res.reservation_id where res.user_id = #{user_id}
